message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe is truly exceptional. This product holds immense value to me, but I understand its potential worth to you might be even greater. After careful consideration, I propose to offer it to you for $1,100,000. This price reflects my desire to ensure a fair transaction while maximizing the value I receive for such a valuable item. I trust this offer will be attractive and fair to both parties. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or if you have any questions. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.
